_header: Saint Matthew til us mind will make
_description: Gospel for the Twentieth Sunday after Trinity in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint matheu til vs minde will makHow crist to his desciples spak…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And rightwis men with crist sal wendevnto þe welth with owten ende
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Loquebatur iesus crist cum discipulis suis.”
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): III.150-15.
